name: Midnight Pastebin by SirBrian - Dark Pastebin
description: Complete with support for common syntax highlights. Up-to-date & Removes ads! Also supports deals.pastebin.com(mostly)!
additional_info: Version 2.8 - 17/Sep/2020 Please let me know if there's something more you want or if you want something to change; create a discussion! I haven't supported ALL syntax highlights, because there's over 250 options for syntax and every single one requires 5-10 unique CSS edits each which is an insane amount of work, and would not even fit within the size limitations here. So, I would love to hear from you which ones you use the most so I can prioritize the most common syntax. Changelog: 2.8: - 17/Sep/2020 • A few really quick changes to at least make it usable. 2.7: - 15/Nov/2019 • Fixed some white text backgrounds+borders on the API page and darkened white separators. • Darkened some bright separators mostly seen on your main paste list and the tools page. 2.6: - 30/Jun/2018 • Removed float boxes in the corner (privacy policy, cookies, etc.) 2.5: - 13/Apr/2018 • Added support for the line highlighting feature. • Supported a second code variation for the daily Pastebin PRO goal donation bar. 2.4: - 24/Nov/2017 • Slightly recolored the daily Pastebin PRO goal donation bar. I won't remove it. 2.3: - 9/Oct/2017 • Removed more ads and space used to place ads. • Brightened some dark gray text to be a little brighter. 2.2: - 4/Jan/2017 • Added option to remove large Pastebin PRO ads(just two large ones for now, including the surrounding space they added), enabled by default. • Color-coded buttons on pastes for "raw," "get," "edit" and "delete." 2.1: - 5/Jun/2016 • Added support for deals.pastebin.com. 2.0: - 12/Feb/2016 • Added option to disable ad removal for those who want to see ads(requested). 1.9: • Updated for the new site layout. • Added support for the search feature. • Additional ad removal. • Fixed Captchas being hidden from ad removal. • Changed error message colors. • Many other minor enhancements. • Updated Primary Screenshot. 1.8: • Added support for the following syntax highlights: AutoHotKey, XML, HTML5. 1.7: • Removed some(all?) random overflow ads. • Updated Primary Screenshot. 1.6: • Ad Block notification is now hidden and doesn't waste any space. • Removed all ads. 1.5: • Changed error message box colors to better fit the theme. 1.4: • Added support for the new private messaging feature. • Adjusted some unnecessary code for a couple image replacements to ensure they work on both Chrome and FireFox. (-moz-box-sizing to box-sizing) 1.3: • Replaced black line number on lines using the highlight feature. 1.2: • Changed specific link colors and header colors. • Updated Primary Screenshot. 1.1: • Replaced "reload" image next to captcha. 1.0: • Uploaded.
